trans-unit.source: Provides a parent class for all three-dimensional transformations, including translation, rotation, and scale transformations.
trans-unit.target: 변환, 회전 및 크기 조정 변환을 포함 하 여 모든&3; 차원 변환에 대 한 부모 클래스를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class to create transformations not available from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> classes.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>클래스에서 사용할 수 없는 변환을 만들 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>클래스.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"> </xref>,이 개체 값의 전체 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을 복사 하는 경우이 메서드 (이러한 요소는 더 이상 확인) 리소스 참조와 데이터 바인딩을 하지만 하지 애니메이션 또는 해당 현재 값을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 복제 된 개체의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에 원본의 <> </> *> 속성은<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"> </xref> 개체를이 개체의 현재 값의 전체 복사본입니다.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 리소스 참조, 데이터 바인딩 및 애니메이션은 복사 되지 않지만 이러한 요소의 현재 값은입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>개체).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 복제 된 개체의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우에 원본의 <> </> *> 속성은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity transformation.
The identity transformation has the effect of multiplying the object by the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: Id 변환을 개체를 항등 매트릭스의 효과가 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identity transformation.
Gets the inverse transformation of this object, if possible.
Inverse is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가능한 경우;이 인스턴스의 역이 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the matrix is affine.
trans-unit.target: Affine 행렬 인지를 지정 하는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An affine transformation preserves collinearity.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the matrix is affine; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>매트릭스 관계; 이면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>.
Point3D to transform.
Transformed Point3D.
Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> objects.
Array of Point3D objects to transform.
Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref>.
Point4D to transform.
Transformed Point4D.
Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref> objects.
Array of Point4D objects to transform.
Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>.
Vector3D to transform.
Transformed Vector3D.
Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> objects.
Array of Vector3D objects to transform.
Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 3 차원 테두리 상자 변환 하 고 축 정렬 된 3 차원 하는 경계 상자 포함할 수 있는 크기를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: TransformBounds is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The 3-D bounding box to transform.
The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed rect.
trans-unit.target: 가장 작은 축 정렬 된 3 차원 수 있는 경계 상자는 변형 된 포함 rect 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 지정 된 3 차원 점을 변환 하려고 하 고 변환의 성공 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 와 달리는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>메서드에서이 메서드는 예외를 throw 하지 변환이 실패 한 경우.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: TryTransform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
The result of transforming `inPoint`.
if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 경우 inPoint 변형 된 못했으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that represents the value of the current transformation.
Matrix3D that represents the value of the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: 현재 변환의 값을 나타내는 Matrix3D 합니다.
